name: 專題討論（一）
goals: the course is designed to provide students with the latest progress in earth sciences via a series of lectures; there are also sessions for students to present their own research result which aim to help them improving presentation and science communication skills.
syllabus:
教學目標:  
使學生學習最新地球科學知識，了解地球科學各領域最新發展  
  
教材內容:  
1.讓學生研讀最新地球科學論文  
2.讓學生與專家學者研討最新地球科學各領域之發展  
  
方法評量:  
1.聘請專家學者演講  
2.讓學生練習演講技巧，討論改進

methodologies.note: 讓學生練習演講技巧，討論改進

grading.note: 上課參與度、討論與報告情形

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
